title: Universe/Frames/AxesTwoDirections
description: Configuration for AxesTwoDirections axes in frames plugin (i.e. rotation from a given parent axes and axes defined by dir1 and dir2)

label2.description: Axis label for projection of second direction onto plane normal to first direction

axes.description: Optional parent axes. If not provided, the base axis of dir1 is used if existing, otherwise the one of dir2 (if neither exists, an exception is thrown)
